message: Let's split it 50/50, fair and square.
I think 60/40 is a more fair split, considering the work I put in to get us this far.
You're not getting 60/40, Bob. You'll have to do better than that.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise. Let's go with 55/45. This is a fair split, given that we've both had to make concessions.
You're not getting out of this that easily, Bob. I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to give in completely.
